集思廣益
1. 呢個BLOG 係講 Grenades Ammunition Box, 其中有提到
The bottom left hand corner has the ‘Batch Key Identity’ with a mark ‘PWD’ indicating a manufacturer, ‘Pains Wessex Defence’ followed by the month, year and batch number.
https://talesfromthesupplydepot.blog/2017/02/16/grenades-ammunition-box/

2. 個tear gas 型號應該是 Rubber Bursting CS Grenade – N225
https://www.hongkongfp.com/2019/07/31/explainer-police-crowd-control-gear-used-hong-kongs-latest-protest-clashes/

3. 由呢2個月唔同時間影既相可以睇到, 只係 PWD 左右邊既數字唔同
https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/hong-kong-protesters-hit-by-british-made-grenades-pcn8cmtcwcr
https://twitter.com/omega_rf/status/1138752537878781952

由此可以推斷那2組數字分別是 month, year and batch number, 再按格式推論左邊是 batch number, 右邊是MM-YY, 即是15年9月


同場加映
"當局2018年7月曾向港府發出用作訓練用途的催淚手榴彈和催淚彈出口證，此後再無發出有關文件"

https://www.hk01.com/%E5%8D%B3%E6%99%82%E5%9C%8B%E9%9A%9B/340736/%E9%80%83%E7%8A%AF%E6%A2%9D%E4%BE%8B-%E5%A4%96%E5%AA%92-%E6%B8%AF%E8%AD%A6%E7%94%A8%E8%8B%B1%E8%A3%BD%E5%82%AC%E6%B7%9A%E5%BD%88-%E8%8B%B1%E6%94%BF%E5%BA%9C%E6%8B%92%E7%99%BC%E9%98%B2%E6%9A%B4%E7%9B%BE%E5%87%BA%E5%8F%A3%E8%AD%89
